name: Light
description: When you take the Attack action and attack with a Light weapon, you can make one extra attack as a Bonus Action later on the same turn. That extra attack must be made with a different Light weapon, and you don't add your ability modifier to the extra attack's damage unless that modifier is negative. This is the basis of two-weapon fighting.
mechanicalEffect: Enables two-weapon fighting. When you attack with a Light weapon, you can make a Bonus Action attack with a different Light weapon (no ability modifier to damage unless negative).
